scripts.filter_warning: test -s output.json && jq -r 'select((.level // "") == "warning") | [(.error // "")] | @csv' output.json > warning.csv || true
scripts.filter_error: test -s output.json && jq -r 'select((.level // "") == "error" and (.source // "") == "console") | [(.msg // "")] | @csv' output.json > errors.csv || true
scripts.warning_report: npm run filter_warning && sort warning.csv -o warning.csv
scripts.error_report: npm run filter_error && sort errors.csv -o errors.csv
